price: 59. Zij zeiden: “Wie heeft dit onze goden aangedaan? Hij moet beslist één van de zondaren zijn.”
arabic: قَالُواْ مَن فَعَلَ هَٰذَا بِـَٔالِهَتِنَآ إِنَّهُۥ لَمِنَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: qālū man faʿala hādhā biālihatinā innahu lamina al-ẓālimīna
